title: Fillet Steak with Creamy Garlic Prawn Sauce
ingredients: ['2 (110g) beef fillet steaks, 4cm thick', '1 tablespoon olive oil', 'salt to taste', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 large shallot, minced', '2 tablespoons minced garlic', '4 tablespoons Chardonnay wine', '225g uncooked prawns - peeled, deveined and cut into thirds', '4 tablespoons double cream', '1 tablespoon butter', 'salt and pepper to taste']
